overview: The viewer is catapulted into the middle of the action. A dwarf warns the fairy kingdom of a huge force that is approaching Osaya, plundering and murdering. This initiates the odyssey of a group of heroes on their mission to save the inhabitants of Osaya. The fairy queen travels to the capital Kundrin Asan, while it turns out that a little beekeeper boy is the only one who can defeat the evil. The fate of all the kingdoms lies now in his hands...
title: The Legend of Osaya
